attributes.action: Re-introduced Wild Boar Should be protected from hunting.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Wild Boar that have been re-introduced into southern England should be protected from hunters. Even if they are not protected for the whole year they should at least be protected for the breeding season, I believe this because currently pregnant or mother Boars have been killed by hunters which inturn leaves behind abandoned offspring which is just cruel and immoral.
